/usr/lib/hardening-wrapper/bin/c++  -std=c++11 -g -Wall -lglfw -lGLEW -lGL  -rdynamic CMakeFiles/Roguelite.dir/src/Draw.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Roguelite.dir/src/Engine.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Roguelite.dir/src/Input.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Roguelite.dir/src/Main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Roguelite.dir/src/Player.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Roguelite.dir/src/ResourceManager.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Roguelite.dir/src/Shader.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Roguelite.dir/src/Texture.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Roguelite.dir/src/Update.cpp.o  -o Roguelite -lGL -lSOIL
